series.Name: VPort 461A Series
series.Title: Superior video performance, 1-channel H.264/MJPEG industrial video encoders
Features and Benefits: Supports up to 4 video streams simultaneously for H.264 and MJPEG
Up to Full D1 resolution (720 x 480) @ 90 fps for 3 video streams with legacy analog video images
2 Ethernet ports for cascading or Ethernet port redundancy
ONVIF support for standardization and interoperability
Local storage capability with SD card slot
Industrial design with -40 to 75°C operating temperature range

introducation: The VPort 461A 1-channel industrial video encoder has a H.264 video compression algorithm that helps provide the best video quality on the market, but with a smaller bandwidth requirement than other video compression standards. In addition, to meet various video stream requirements, the VPort 461A can provide up to 4 video streams simultaneously using H.264 and MJPEG compression formats. Video streams can be used for different purposes, such as viewing, recording, and analysis. In addition, the rugged industrial design, which includes a -40 to 75°C operating temperature and industrial certifications, makes the VPort 461A suitable for harsh environments.

The VPort 461A is equipped with Moxa’s innovative DynaStream™ technology, which allows users to change the video frame rate automatically. With DynaStream™, users can control their network bandwidth budget and simplify network system management. The CBR Pro™ function helps to guarantee the lowest packet loss under limited bandwidth transmissions to ensure that images will not exhibit the mosaic effect.

Ethernet Software Features.Protocols: TCP/IP, IPv4/IPv6, UDP, HTTP, RTP/RTSP, ARP, UPnP, FTP, TFTP, SMTP, NTP Client, DNS, DDNS, QoS, IGMP v3, ICMP, SNMPv1/v2c/v3, Modbus TCP, HTTPS, 802.1X, NTCIP

LED Interface.LED Indicators: STAT: Indicates if system is booted up properly or not

Serial Interface.PTZ Port: 1, RS-232 or RS-422/485 port, terminal block connector, 115.2 kbps
Serial Interface.COM Port: 1, RS-232 or RS-485 port, DB9 male connector, 115.2 kbps

Video Interface.Video Streams: 4 independent H.264 or MJPEG video streams
Video Interface.Video Viewing: DynaStream™ support for changing the video frame rate automatically

Audio Interface.Audio Inputs: 1 Line-in or MIC-in with 3.5 mm phone jack

Camera Software Development.VPort SDK PLUS: Includes CGI commands, ActiveX Control, and API library for customized applications or system integration for third-party developers

Camera PAN/TILT/ZOOM.PTZ Camera Control: Via PTZ port or COM port
Camera PAN/TILT/ZOOM.PTZ Control Functions: Pan, tilt, zoom, focus, move speed, preset position (max. 128 positions)
Camera PAN/TILT/ZOOM.Protocols: Pelco D, Pelco P, Custom Camera

Camera Alarm Software Features.Imaging: JPEG snapshots for pre/trigger/post alarm images
Camera Alarm Software Features.Custom Alarms: HTTP event servers for setting customized alarm actions
Camera Alarm Software Features.Email/FTP Messaging: Automatic transfer of stored images via email or FTP as event-triggered actions
Camera Alarm Software Features.Pre-Alarm Buffer: 50 MB video buffer for JPEG snapshot images
Camera Alarm Software Features.Video Recording: Event recordings stored on the SD card

Physical Characteristics.Installation: DIN-rail mounting, Wall mounting (with optional kit)

Standards and Certifications.EMS: IEC 61000-4-2 ESD: Contact: 6 kV; Air: 8 kV
Standards and Certifications.Freefall: IEC 61000-4-3 RS: 80 MHz to 1 GHz: 20 V/m
Standards and Certifications.Safety: IEC 61000-4-4 EFT: Power: 2 kV; Signal: 2 kV
Standards and Certifications.Shock: IEC 61000-4-5 Surge: Power: 2 kV; Signal: 1 kV
